      • checkPassword

        public boolean checkPassword(java.lang.String email,
                             java.lang.String hashedPassword)
        Checks if hash of the entered password matches that of the database.
        Specified by:
        checkPassword in interface logIn
        Parameters:
        email - Target email is used to identify the Member.
        hashedPassword - Hashed password to be matched.
        Returns:
        true if hashed password matches.

      • checkExistenceEmail

        public boolean checkExistenceEmail(java.lang.String email)
        Check if email of Member exists in the database
        Specified by:
        checkExistenceEmail in interface logIn
        Parameters:
        name - Target email of Member to be checked.
        Returns:

      • checkName

      • logIn

        public static int logIn()
        Returns:
        int

      • checkExistenceID

        public int checkExistenceID()
        Generates unique memberID that is greater than the greatest memberID in database by 1.
        Returns:
        Int of unique memberID.

      • createMember

        public static int createMember()
        Creates new Member Generates new MemberID and checks if email is already in use. If email is not in used, new Member will be written to CSV using MovieGoerSerializer.
        Returns:
        1 if succesfully created, 0 if unsuccessful.

      • signUp

        public static void signUp()
        signUp function. Uses createMember. if creation is succesful, Member are directed to logIn.

      • checkMovieGoerID

        public static int checkMovieGoerID(java.lang.String email)
        Get MovieGoer's ID from given email.
        Parameters:
        email - Email of MovieGoer to have name returned.
        Returns:
        name of MovieGoer.
